entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Snow or periods of ice pellets beginning this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow or periods of ice pellets ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
